title: Fee refund
content:
I surrendered my PES seat on 19th July and still haven’t been refunded my fee amount. I was told at the university that it would take 8-10 days for the amount to be refunded. Now it’s been more than 10 days. Anybody else waiting for their fees to be refunded? 
For anyone who has received the refund, how long did it take from the time you surrendered your seat?

comments.body: Ask the college again once, 10k will be deducted from ur fees, apart from that the remaining amount will be refunded
Yes, I’m aware of the deduction. Will probably contact the college regarding the refund date.
So which college are you joining?

You should get it within 15 working days.

College says 10 working days. 

Received all in F&F
Yes I received the refund an hour ago
